channel.title: Questions about max hit and spec?
channel.description:
how do i make a mage short bow spec that hits twice and how do i change the hit of a special like my bgs hits 45's max how i change to like 70 instead of 45. also with a granite maul how can i make so the double fast click works.. finally, how can i make it so you must get 6 kills before clicking on the barrows chest..
thanks, poopersoop..
